actions.title: ${tempVars("embedtitle")}
actions.author: Spirit Bot | Made With ❤️ By Ryze
actions.name: Create Embed Message
Send Message

actions.message: You're not allowed to run the command purge.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
**COMMAND LIST**
-----------------
**Adminstrator**              

s.kick [@user] [Reason]                      |         kicks the mentioned user
s.ban  [@user] [Reason]                      |         bans the mentioned user
s.mute [@user] [Reason]                      |         mutes the mentioned user
s.announce                                   |         [Ex: s.announce (title) (message)
s.warn [@user] [reason]                      |         warns the mentioned user
s.purge [number of messages]                 |         deletes (x) amount of messages 
s.poll [poll reason]                         |         creates a poll for people to like or dislike
s.userinfo [@user]                           |         shows a users info
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message: Spirit Bot | Made With ❤️ By Ryze

actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
**11 CODES**
**11-1** -Assault
**11-2** - Minor Assault
**11-3** - High-Hazard Assault
**11-4** - Officer Being Followed
**11-5** - 11-4 W/Dangerous Persons
**11-6** - Attack
**11-7** - Armed Attack
**11-8** - Trauma
**11-9** - Minor Trauma
**11-10** - Critical Trauma
**11-11** - Person Deceased

**SIGNALS**
**Signal 1** - Dispatch Available
**Signal 2** - Dispatch Unavailable
**Signal 3** - Supervisors Available
**Signal 4** - Supervisors Unavailable
**Signal 5** - Bolo Report
**Signal 6** - Bolo Status / Update
**Signal 7** - Warrant Report
**Signal 8** - Warrant Status / Update
**Signal 9** - Busy
**Signal 10** - Speed Trap
**Signal 11** - Running Radar
**Signal 41** - 10-8, 10-41 (On-Duty)
**Signal 42** - 10-7, 10-42 (Off-Duty)
**Signal 50** - K9 Response
**Signal 60** - Drug Transport
**Signal 70** - Body Transport
**Signal 80** - Bomb Transport
**Signal 90** - Illegal Weaponry Transport
**Signal 100** - All but Emergency Traffic

**CODES**
**Code 0** - Game Crash
**Code 1** - Ambulance Response, Priority
**Code 2** - No Lights, No Siren
**Code 3** - Lights and Siren
**Code 4** - Under Control / Clear
**Code 5** - Felony / High Risk Stop
**Code 6** - Investigation - Follow Up
**Code 7** - Briefing
**Code 8** - Explosion
**Code 9** - All-Unit Report (10-73)
**Code 10** - Swat Response
**Code 100** - Armed Robbery
​**Code 100-2** - Robbery
**Code 200** - Prison Break (Swat Response Follows)

actions.title: Nickname Request
actions.author: Spirit Bot | Made With ❤️ By Ryze
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
To change your nickname, Do s.nick >Mention yourself and then type what you want your name to be 

Example: s.nick @Ryze Ryzerator
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.title: Suggestions
actions.author: Spirit Bot | Made With ❤️ By Ryze
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
To make a suggestion simply run the command

**s.suggest (your suggestion here) and your suggestion will be sent to the #suggestions channel where people cant vote if its a cool suggestion or not**

Note: Admins and owners choose to accept the suggestion or deny it!
actions.name: Set Embed Description

**s.new (reason) and a channel will be created just for you to access**

actions.message:
**COMMAND LIST**
-----------------
**Everyone to use**

**s.Help                      Shows the list of commands
s.serverinfo
s.serverinvite              Creates a server invite in 1 second
s.botinfo                   Shows the bots info
s.servers                   Shows the amount of servers spirit is in
s.total                     Shows all commands**

**Fun Commands**

**              
s.slap                      Slaps a mentioned person
s.knockknock                Makes a knock knock joke**

**Music Commands*
**s.play                      plays a song (Ex: s.play https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ll0YUJd5ntQ)
s.skip                      skips the current playing song
s.upbeat                    Plays UpBeat radio**
